comments.html: One valid use case for UCMP is anycast services. If I have 4 anycast nodes behind leaf1 and 1 behind leaf2 I want the spines to UCMP that traffic to the leafs.
comments.name: Pete Lumbis

comments.html: @Pete: and all of a sudden the weird DMZ Bandwidth features in Arista EOS make perfect sense. Thanks a million!
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
